listing.entry:
echo \$(echo \
  "My country, 'tis of thee," \
  "Sweet land of liberty" | rev)
echo '$(inputs.val)'     # produce val
echo '\$(inputs.val)'    # produce $(inputs.val)
echo
echo '\\$(inputs.val)'   # produce \val
echo '\\\$(inputs.val)'  # produce \$(inputs.val)
echo
echo '\\\\$(inputs.val)'  # produce \\val
echo '\\\\\$(inputs.val)'  # produce \\$(inputs.val)
echo
echo '\\\\\\$(inputs.val)'  # produce \\\val
echo '\\\\\\\$(inputs.val)'  # produce \\\$(inputs.val)
echo
echo '\\\\\\\\$(inputs.val)'  # produce \\\\val
echo '\\\\\\\\\$(inputs.val)'  # produce \\\\$(inputs.val)
echo
echo '\\\\\\\\\\$(inputs.val)'  # produce \\\\\val
echo '\\\\\\\\\\\$(inputs.val)'  # produce \\\\\$(inputs.val)
echo '\'          # produce \
echo '\\'         # produce \
echo '\\\'        # produce \\
echo '\\\\'       # produce \\
echo '\\\\\'      # produce \\\
echo '\\\\\\'     # produce \\\
echo '\\\\\\\'    # produce \\\\
echo '\\\\\\\\'   # produce \\\\
echo '\\\\\\\\\'  # produce \\\\\
echo '\\\\\\\\\\' # produce \\\\\
echo '$'          # produce $
echo '\$'         # produce \$
echo '\\$'        # produce \$
echo '$$'         # produce $$
echo '$$$'        # produce $$$
